data.what_is:
Dialytica is an Omni-channel marketing platform combining various methods of modern marketing outreach into one streamlined interface. A fresh take on Traditional voice broadcasting full of additional features, filters, and tools combined with a robust back-end developed by industry-experts means better deliverability than ever.  Bring your own carrier or utilize our deep relationships to find the right downstream routes for you. 
 
Dialytica also offers a modern SMS delivery interface, automated AI-powered Call-QA with an integrated chatbot to help you with any questions about your agent performance on calls. A conversational AI bot built with our proprietary speech to text technology can pre-qualify callers or even handle routine customer service requests, freeing up your staff for more complicated tasks.
data.product_description:
Dialytica is an Omni-channel marketing platform combining various methods of modern marketing outreach into one streamlined interface. A fresh take on Traditional voice broadcasting full of additional features, filters, and tools combined with a robust back-end developed by industry-experts means better deliverability than ever.  Bring your own carrier or utilize our deep relationships to find the right downstream routes for you. 
 
Dialytica also offers a modern SMS delivery interface, automated AI-powered Call-QA with an integrated chatbot to help you with any questions about your agent performance on calls. A conversational AI bot built with our proprietary speech to text technology can pre-qualify callers or even handle routine customer service requests, freeing up your staff for more complicated tasks.
